TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Matrix extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

Docs.summary: Represents a 3x3 affine transformation matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This struct represents the .NET projection of the Windows Runtime (WinRT) `Matrix` struct. For more information, see [Matrix](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.media.matrix) in the UWP API reference.
